title: Abortion setback in Ohio alarms GOP, as Democrats see a 'roadmap for 2024'
description: Losses on abortion ballot measures in Ohio and other states since the Supreme Court overturned Roe v. Wade, has some Republicans worried.

title: Biden imposes U.S. investment restrictions on some high-tech industries in China
description: The executive order puts limits on investing in Chinese industries such as quantum computing and artificial intelligence.

title: FBI fatally shoots man in Utah who allegedly threatened Biden, Alvin Bragg and others
description: The FBI shot and killed a man Wednesday while executing a search warrant in Provo, Utah, federal officials said.

title: Robbie Robertson, leader of The Band, dies at 80
description: Robbie Robertson, a Canadian musician and songwriter who made his mark as the leader of the 1970s with the influential rock group The Band, died Wednesday after a long illness.

title: Given Montgomery’s history, it was no surprise Black people rushed to defend the dockworker, locals say
description: In the Montgomery, Alabama, riverfront melee, the city’s civil rights history informed Black people’s defense of the dockworker.

title: 'Like a boxing match': Ron DeSantis and Gavin Newsom embrace ‘risk’ in surprise debate
description: Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis and California Gov. Gavin Newsom, on opposite ends of the aisle, have agreed to a debate moderated by Fox News host Sean Hannity.

title: Special counsel executed a search warrant of Trump's Twitter account in 2020 probe
description: Special counsel Jack Smith's office executed a search warrant on former President Donald Trump's Twitter account earlier this year.

title: Two suspects in Montgomery riverfront brawl haven't turned themselves in, police say
description: Two of the three suspects facing misdemeanor assault charges related to the Montgomery riverfront brawl have yet to turn themselves in to police, a police spokesperson told NBC News.

title: Pentagon launches AI competition to solicit help securing computer systems
description: DARPA, the Pentagon agency that funds moonshot technology innovations, is hosting a two-year competition for artificial intelligence experts to create new ways to bolster the world’s cybersecurity.

title: New details emerge on how 6-year-old boy who shot Virginia teacher got mom's gun
description: The 6-year-old boy who seriously wounded his teacher at a Virginia elementary school in January said in the aftermath that "I did it" and "I got my mom's gun last night," according to newly unsealed court documents.

title: Georgia prosecutor expected to present Trump election case to grand jury next week
description: Fulton County DA Fani Willis, who is investigating Donald Trump‘s alleged 2020 election efforts in Georgia, is expected to present her case to a grand jury next week.

title: Dianne Feinstein went to the hospital after a 'minor fall' at home, spokesperson says
description: Sen. Dianne Feinstein, D-Calif., fell at home on Tuesday and "briefly" visited the hospital to get checked out, her office said.

title: Twelve rescued after jumping into the ocean to escape Hawaii wildfires
description: Twelve rescued after jumping into the ocean to escape Hawaii wildfires

title: Homeland Security identifies 311 child victims of sexual exploitation in 'cold cases'
description: Investigators from Homeland Security and more than a dozen agencies around the world have identified 311 probable victims in "cold cases" of child sexual exploitation.

title: Apple is planning to move the button to hang up a call in new iPhone software
description: Apple’s iOS 17 will include one of the biggest revamps to the iPhone’s phone app in years.

title: Massive explosion hits plant near Moscow, injuring dozens
description: A massive explosion rocked Zagorsk optical-mechanical plant in the Moscow region city of Sergiev Posad on Wednesday, local officials said.

title: Long-term drought and near-term heat wave take toll on Arizona's desert ecology
description: Frank Reichenbacher worries it will soon be over for his Tumamoc globeberry — a rare Sonoran desert vine that features a fruit that looks like a tiny watermelon and tastes like dirt.

title: Ukraine turns to sea drones in bid to take the war to Russia
description: Ukraine’s is increasingly taking the fight to Russia in attacks with aerial and sea drones as Kyiv's counteroffensive struggles on the ground.

title: Vulnerable Republicans aren't sold on impeaching Biden
description: House Speaker Kevin McCarthy is facing unease within his ranks about impeaching President Joe Biden.

title: Lawyers for ex-Lizzo dancers say they are reviewing more complaints in wake of lawsuit
description: Lawyers representing three of Lizzo’s former dancers said they have been reviewing new complaints since she was accused of sexual harassment, creating a hostile work environment and weight-shaming in a lawsuit filed last week.

title: In a win for abortion-rights supporters, Ohio voters reject Issue 1
description: Ohio voters rejected a ballot measure that would make it harder to enshrine abortion rights in the state constitution, a major win for reproductive rights supporters.
